title: Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch Picture Drama - Kamen Kokuhaku Taikai
title_japanese: コードギアス 反逆のルルーシュ 仮面告白大会 第1週来場者特典 ピクチャードラマ
title_synonyms: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion - Masked Confession Competition
synopsis: A picture drama bonus included in a special DVD given to all who purchased a ticket for the film Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch I - Koudou over the course of the first six weeks of airing.

Parent story.name: Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch I - Koudou
